recipesJson.name: 1,2,3 ID10T #theyearinmixing
recipesJson.author: Deweysuds
recipesJson.description: This is for the year in mixing tribute challenge.  I used his 123 formula, picked three flavors he raves about, and kept it odd!  This is the 123 ID10T mango honeysuckle milk.  It actually tastes pretty damn good!
